content:
You're welcome! I'm thrilled to have been able to help you discover new resources and books that align with your interests. Diverse representation and strong female protagonists are essential in fantasy and science fiction, and it's wonderful that you're making a conscious effort to seek them out.

Remember, reading is a great way to broaden your perspectives, challenge your assumptions, and explore new worlds and ideas. By supporting authors and books that showcase diverse representation and strong female protagonists, you're helping to create a more inclusive and vibrant literary landscape.

Don't hesitate to reach out if you need more recommendations or have any questions. Happy reading, and I hope you discover many amazing books that resonate with you!
